entry.title: Something weird is happening with Tim.
entry.summary:
Author: Dontaskjustlook

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,467Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 17

Summary: Tim cracked his eyes open, finding Jason holding a carrot in one hand and a cucumber in the other. “What?” he mumbled, his voice heavy with sleep. “I don’t know. The writer didn’t bother to write her thoughts, and now she doesn’t remember what was supposed to happen here.” Tim frowned, disoriented, his stomach turning. Jason shook the vegetables with a wide grin. “Which one do you want me to fuck you with?” Tim shut his eyes again, turning his head away. “I’m not doing that.” Jason tugged at the soft skin of his arm. “You don’t have many options. You’re just a character written by someone else’s words.” “Huh?” Tim muttered, confusion thick in his tone. “Stop asking questions. There are no answers.” Jason lifted both vegetables like props. “Let’s just play out some prompts.” “Prompts?” Tim asked. “That, my brother,” Jason pointed at him with the carrot, eyes gleaming, “is the funny part.” He twirled the carrot between his fingers, lips pulling into a crooked smile. “So, am I fucking you with this or not?”

entry.title: Life on the Other Side
entry.summary:
Author: Akio_O

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,988Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 263

Summary: For Timothy Drake, obsession is far worse than compulsion.Compulsivity is action. Action can be taken and completed at any time, it’s mindless. It’s repetitive movement, expected and anticipated more often than not.Obsession is far worse. Obsession plagues the mind and overtakes rationality. It spins spiderwebs in the brain and warps your very being. It can spawn from the simplest thing and then spiral into an all encompassing essentiality.TLDR; Tim needs to know everything, Damian is hard to know and the world makes it impossible. Plus a stroll on the darker side of Gotham!
